long_description: Built for warm-weather outings, the girls' Merrell Sierra Sandals will keep her feet cool and comfortable so she can explore sandy beaches or neighborhood trails in total comfort. Strappy leather uppers provide durable, flexible support; rip-and-stick closures at ankle and top of foot allow easy on/off. EVA midsoles and foam footbeds provide cushioning underfoot; nylon shanks provide all-day support. AEGIS Microbe Shield(R) antimicrobial treatment deters odor development. Durable rubber outsoles on the Merrell Sierra Sandals provide great traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Built for warm-weather outings, the girls' Merrell Sierra Sandals will keep her feet cool and comfortable so she can explore sandy beaches or neighborhood trails in total comfort.
